en-US: This URL is an official iNKORE site. You can trust it completely when using a safe HTTPS connection. You can enter your information here without any worries, but be careful when using the site tells you that the connection is not secure, or you're using public Wi-Fi networks, untrusted VPNs, or other insecure connections.
zh-CN: 此 URL 是官方 iNKORE 网站。使用安全的 HTTPS 连接时，您可以完全信任它。但当网站告诉您连接不安全时，或者您使用公共 Wi-Fi 网络、不受信任的 VPN 或其他不安全的连接时，就要小心了。
